definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
dawn/morning/daybreak/day/dan, female roles in Chinese opera (traditionally played by specialized male actors)

sentences.english: The developments and current situation of tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction are presented.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鉭鈮溼法冶金技術的發展概況和現狀。

sentences.english: The method has been applied to the determination of trace tantalum in stone coal flag with satisfactory results.
sentences.chinese: 該法已應用於石煤渣中痕量鉭的測定，結果令人滿意。

sentences.english: The niobium-tantalum and rare-earths ore deposits in China and their occurred minerals are described.
sentences.chinese: 該文對我國鈮鉭稀土礦牀及其產出的礦物進行了論述。

sentences.english: The effect of electrolyte on high frequency electrical property of wet tantalum capacitors was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了電解質對高頻液體鉭電容器電性能的影響。

sentences.english: This investigation deals with the formation mechanism of tantalum anode oxidation membrane.
sentences.chinese: 用交流阻抗法對鉭陽極氧化膜生成機理進行了研究。

sentences.english: The enrichment and recovery of tantalum and niobium through acid leaching and sodium alkali fusing from tungsten residue is studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: We export Titanium, Tantalum, Niobium, Zirconium and Nickel materials and finished products, kindly contact for inquiry!
sentences.chinese: 我司出口鈦，鉭，鈮，鋯，鈮金屬材料及其製品。

sentences.english: Experiment is done on the acid hydrolysis of titanium-columbite-tantalite ore difficult to decompose.
sentences.chinese: 對難分解的鈦鉭鈮礦的酸分解工藝進行了試驗研究。

sentences.english: Uses: cold welding of nonferrous metals such as Cu Al Ag Ni Pt Sn Zn Ta and some of their alloys.
sentences.chinese: 鉭鈮等有色金屬線材及他們部分合金線材的焊接。

sentences.english: Textures of different samples were determined by EBSD.
sentences.chinese: 經EBSD測定了不同狀態下鉭的織構。

sentences.english: Technology survey and development tendency investigation on tantalum-niobium hydrometallurgical extraction;
sentences.chinese: 研究了用酸浸與鈉鹼熔融法從鎢渣中富集和回收鉭鈮。

sentences.english: Low price compared to tantalum capacitors.
sentences.chinese: 與鉭電容器相比價格更低。

sentences.english: Nano-sized silver sodium niobate tantalate was studied in this paper using wet-chemical method.
sentences.chinese: 對液相法合成鉭鈮酸銀鈉的納米粉體進行了研究。

sentences.english: Among the high temperature nonferrous metals are molybdenum, niobium, tantalum , and tungsten.
sentences.chinese: 高溫有色金屬包括鉬，鈮，鉭，鎢。

sentences.english: The performance of the new developed automatic spot welding machine for tantalum block queuing has been greatly enhanced.
sentences.chinese: 新研製的鉭芯自動成排點焊機性能有了很大提高。

definition: respect, regard/to stand in awe of, to be alarmed
a long narrow vessel with two masts
limited (of talent or ability)/(archaic) solid wheel (without spokes)
